title: Peaceful Five-Star Retreat on the Banks of Suzhou’s Jinji Lake
description: Discover the beautiful panoramic views of one of China’s largest lakes with a stay at the showstopping, crescent-shaped InterContinental Suzhou, an IHG Hotel. Ideally located in the Suzhou Industrial Park, this hotel is perfect for those wanting to soak in the creative art scene and have access to a myriad of shopping malls. Catering to all food lovers, the hotel boasts five onsite restaurants and bars, all of which offer stunning views of the peaceful lake or glowing city skyline.
offer_address: No. 288 Wang Dun Road, Suzhou Industrial Park, Suzhou, 215028, Mainland China

title: Sky-High Suzhou Stay with Top-Floor Restaurant & Bar
description: At the top of the Longfor Centre in Suzhou's New District, Hotel Indigo Suzhou Grand Canal, an IHG Hotel is an urban retreat that soars above the city streets. Experience life in this dynamic city as you explore bustling eateries and robust retail strips, as well as the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Grand Canal. On your return, relish Mediterranean fusion cuisine at PIER 46, a top-floor restaurant and bar serving signature cocktails alongside stunning panoramic city views.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Suzhou Grand Canal, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Building 13, No. 79 East Jinshan Road, Suzhou New District, Suzhou, Jiangsu Sheng 215010, China

title: Sophisticated High-Rise Stay in the Heart of Suzhou with Five Restaurants & Bars, Pool & Spa
description:
Step into the timeless elegance of this five-star Hyatt Regency sanctuary, nestled in one of China’s most enchanting cities. Nearby Suzhou’s centuries-old classical gardens and the picturesque Jinji Lake, this stylish urban haven offers seamless access to the city’s deep-rooted cultural heritage and bustling city life.

Within the hotel, savour a world of flavours - from the global culinary delights at Market Café to the authentic tastes of Suzhou at Hua Chi 88, where signature dishes including succulent Peking duck take centre stage. Whether you're recharging in the state-of-the-art fitness centre or unwinding in the serene indoor pool, every detail is designed to elevate your stay.
offer_address: 88 Huachi Street, Suzhou Industrial Park, Suzhou 215028, China

title: Suzhou Serene Riverside Stay Near Classical Chinese Garden
description: Retreat to verdant gardens and tranquil river views with a serene stay at the Kimpton Bamboo Grove Suzhou, an IHG Hotel, in the heart of this striking city. Enjoy authentic Jiangsu cuisine or a seasonal Japanese omakase menu at the onsite restaurants, take a rejuvenating dip in the indoor pool or work up a sweat in the fitness centre. As the evening approaches, savour a sophisticated cocktail at Bar 168 before finding moments of evening tranquillity and rest in the elegant guest rooms.
location_description: Kimpton Bamboo Grove Suzhou, an IHG hotel
offer_address: 168 Zhuhui Road, Gusu District, Suzhou, 215006 China

title: China Suzhou Lakeside Retreat with Three World-Class Restaurants
description: Lose yourself among the enchanted gardens of Suzhou with a stay at Crowne Plaza Suzhou, an IHG Hotel, an upscale urban retreat on the shores of Jinji Lake. Here, dining is a celebrated affair with three excellent venues serving up everything from gourmet Cantonese seafood to an international buffet and casual comfort food. In between adventures, cool off with a dip in either of the two swimming pools, or keep up with your workout regime at the fully equipped fitness centre.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Suzhou, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 168 Xinggang Street, Suzhou Industrial Park, Suzhou 215021, China

title: Serene Suzhou Stay at Yangcheng Lake
description: Escape the everyday at Hotel Indigo Suzhou Yangcheng Lake, an IHG Hotel, with a serene stay boasting stunning waterfront views. Stroll through Lianchihu Ecological Park or find a tranquil moment at Chongyuan Temple. Back at the hotel, plunge into the pool, bask luxuriously on sun lounges or unwind on lush stretches of lawn before satisfying your appetite with a pleasant picnic or savouring locally sourced cuisine in style at Cheng 16 restaurant.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Suzhou Yangcheng Lake, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 16 Wanyue Street, Suzhou, Jiangsu Sheng 215127, China
